I can tell you that we are all looking forward to going there.

However, I have been asked by the class to propose to you another visitanother visit to you. We all wouldwould all like to go and see the London Fashion and Leisure Show which will take place on Tuesday 14th March, from 10.00 to 19.00, in the London's Central exhibitionExhibition Hall. This show is about the latest fashions, the leisure and sports wear, the make-up and the hairstyles.

Everybody in the class is interested in this show, and it would be a great opportunity for us to see it, especially because many of us would like to work later in the fashion industry. Moreover, this show won't cost anything because it is free for the students!

Consequently, I proposedpropose we to changechange the programme as follows;: on Tuesday afternoon, instead of shopping, we could go to this show and we could go shopping on Wednesday afternoon, during our free time. What do you think about that?

"Famous people, such as politicians and film stars, deserve to have a private life without journalists following them all the time."

Nowadays, most people think that famous people have a sosuchsuch a good life (with lots of money, comfortable househouses etc) that they have to stop complaining about hethe media's treatment , because they have chosen to have this kind of life.

On the one hand, it is true because famous people have to do their jobs, that means being interviewed, giving news to the audianceaudiencepublic, and soonso on. Moreover, especially forwith film stars, lots of people are hoping to see them on the TvTV or in the newspapers, and this is really good for their famecareers.

However, on the other hand, it must be so annoying to be followed by journalists or photographsphotographers all the time. You can't go outside quietlyin peace, and there is all the timealways a crowndcrowd of people who standsstand in front of your house waiting for you.

The question you have to ask yourself is: would you like to have all the time people around your housepeople around your house all the time who are watching at you or people who are following you everywhere? I am sure that nobody would like this.
That is why I think that famous people deserve a private life, like everybody else, and that journalists should not follow them everywhere.
